articles.content:

articles.title: Biden announces complete U.S. troop withdrawal from Afghanistan by Sept. 11, 2021 - CBC.ca
articles.description: U.S. President Joe Biden said Wednesday he will withdraw remaining U.S. troops from Afghanistan, declaring that the Sept. 11 attacks "cannot explain" why American forces should still be there 20 years after the deadly assault on the United States.
